data.title: Mobile Websites Design & Development
data.description: Profit by Adapting to China’s Mobile Revolution

tab.title: Overview
markdown: Close to 80% of China’s 620 million Internet users are online primarily with a mobile device. Mobility is now a required segment for any company striving for China digital best practice.

Global providers of medical diagnostic kits with fledgling China presence. Provider wished to target growing Chinese mobile Internet user demographic with a streamlined version of their large, cumbersome site, in order to boost conversion rate.
